original_text: And Israel said, Wherefore dealt ye so ill with me, as to tell the man whether ye had yet a brother?
korean_text: 이스라엘이 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 너희에게 또 다른 아우가 있다고 그 사람에게 말하여 나를 괴롭게 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Wherefore dealt ye so ill with me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 어찌하여 나에게 이렇게 악하게 행하였느냐

sentences.original_text: whether ye had yet a brother
